positions.subtitle: Ninjacart
positions.description: 𝘓𝘦𝘥 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘈𝘱𝘱 𝘚𝘵𝘰𝘳𝘦 𝘖𝘱𝘵𝘪𝘮𝘪𝘻𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯(𝘈𝘚𝘖), 𝘉𝘳𝘢𝘯𝘥 & 𝘗𝘦𝘳𝘧𝘰𝘳𝘮𝘢𝘯𝘤𝘦 𝘮𝘢𝘳𝘬𝘦𝘵𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘧𝘰𝘳 𝘢 𝘉2𝘊 𝘍𝘢𝘳𝘮𝘦𝘳 𝘈𝘱𝘱–𝘕𝘪𝘯𝘫𝘢 𝘒𝘪𝘴𝘢𝘯• Conducted competition & keyword research to identify high-traffic, low-competition KWs, boosting app visibility • Analyzed app store data and Optimized creatives & metadata, uplifting organic search rank for core keywords• Developed custom store & localized listings tailored for specific themes & languages, improving conversion rates by 20% • Leveraged data analytics, customer feedback & A/B tests to stabilize uninstalls & scale organic installs to 40K/month • Conducted user research to uncover insights on category behavior, pain points, media consumption, App usage, etc.• Developed distinctive brand identity & messaging based on insights from user research and competition analysis• Developed regionalized content for Perf. marketing, resulting in a 20% drop in CPI and a 15% increase in conv. rates • Collaborated with Agri influencers on branded content, improving branded search vol by 40% & Conv. rate by 18%• Leveraged Firebase analytics to stabilize D0 Uninstalls and W1 Retention, optimizing campaigns by pausing underperformers, refining communication, and reallocating budgets.
positions.title: Growth & Marketing Manager
positions.description_html:
𝘓𝘦𝘥 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘈𝘱𝘱 𝘚𝘵𝘰𝘳𝘦 𝘖𝘱𝘵𝘪𝘮𝘪𝘻𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯(𝘈𝘚𝘖), 𝘉𝘳𝘢𝘯𝘥 & 𝘗𝘦𝘳𝘧𝘰𝘳𝘮𝘢𝘯𝘤𝘦 𝘮𝘢𝘳𝘬𝘦𝘵𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘧𝘰𝘳 𝘢 𝘉2𝘊 𝘍𝘢𝘳𝘮𝘦𝘳 𝘈𝘱𝘱–𝘕𝘪𝘯𝘫𝘢 𝘒𝘪𝘴𝘢𝘯

• Conducted competition & keyword research to identify high-traffic, low-competition KWs, boosting app visibility
• Analyzed app store data and Optimized creatives & metadata, uplifting organic search rank for core keywords
• Developed custom store & localized listings tailored for specific themes & languages, improving conversion rates by 20%
• Leveraged data analytics, customer feedback & A/B tests to stabilize uninstalls & scale organic installs to 40K/month
• Conducted user research to uncover insights on category behavior, pain points, media consumption, App usage, etc.
• Developed distinctive brand identity & messaging based on insights from user research and competition analysis
• Developed regionalized content for Perf. marketing, resulting in a 20% drop in CPI and a 15% increase in conv. rates
• Collaborated with Agri influencers on branded content, improving branded search vol by 40% & Conv. rate by 18%
• Leveraged Firebase analytics to stabilize D0 Uninstalls and W1 Retention, optimizing campaigns by pausing underperformers, refining communication, and reallocating budgets.

positions.subtitle: Ninjacart
positions.description: 𝘓𝘦𝘥 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘪𝘥𝘦𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯, 𝘱𝘪𝘭𝘰𝘵 𝘭𝘢𝘶𝘯𝘤𝘩, 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘱𝘳𝘰𝘨𝘳𝘢𝘮 𝘮𝘢𝘯𝘢𝘨𝘦𝘮𝘦𝘯𝘵 𝘰𝘧 𝘢 𝘭𝘰𝘺𝘢𝘭𝘵𝘺 𝘱𝘳𝘰𝘨𝘳𝘢𝘮 𝘵𝘰 𝘴𝘤𝘢𝘭𝘦 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘳𝘢𝘵𝘦 𝘰𝘧 𝘵𝘳𝘢𝘥𝘦𝘳 𝘢𝘤𝘲𝘶𝘪𝘴𝘪𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯 • Ideated the program, shortlisted potential test markets, Defined the GTM strategy, & scaled the program to 5 markets• Coordinated with external vendors to develop a digital referral tracking flow & Rewards withdrawal system • Identified bottlenecks slowing down the acquisition speed & influenced internal stakeholders to redesign processes• Designed automated dashboards to monitor onboarding progress, acquisition speed & team performance, in real-time.• Monitored burn rates, & implemented cost-control measures to scale efficiently without compromising program impact• Managed an on-ground team of 10 to achieve a 2.5x increase in acquisition speed while controlling the burn rate to 1.5x
positions.title: Growth Manager
positions.description_html:
𝘓𝘦𝘥 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘪𝘥𝘦𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯, 𝘱𝘪𝘭𝘰𝘵 𝘭𝘢𝘶𝘯𝘤𝘩, 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘱𝘳𝘰𝘨𝘳𝘢𝘮 𝘮𝘢𝘯𝘢𝘨𝘦𝘮𝘦𝘯𝘵 𝘰𝘧 𝘢 𝘭𝘰𝘺𝘢𝘭𝘵𝘺 𝘱𝘳𝘰𝘨𝘳𝘢𝘮 𝘵𝘰 𝘴𝘤𝘢𝘭𝘦 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘳𝘢𝘵𝘦 𝘰𝘧 𝘵𝘳𝘢𝘥𝘦𝘳 𝘢𝘤𝘲𝘶𝘪𝘴𝘪𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯

• Ideated the program, shortlisted potential test markets, Defined the GTM strategy, & scaled the program to 5 markets
• Coordinated with external vendors to develop a digital referral tracking flow & Rewards withdrawal system
• Identified bottlenecks slowing down the acquisition speed & influenced internal stakeholders to redesign processes
• Designed automated dashboards to monitor onboarding progress, acquisition speed & team performance, in real-time.
• Monitored burn rates, & implemented cost-control measures to scale efficiently without compromising program impact
• Managed an on-ground team of 10 to achieve a 2.5x increase in acquisition speed while controlling the burn rate to 1.5x

experience.title: Marketing Manager
experience.description: 𝘓𝘦𝘥 360-𝘥𝘦𝘨𝘳𝘦𝘦 𝘮𝘢𝘳𝘬𝘦𝘵𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘢𝘤𝘵𝘪𝘷𝘪𝘵𝘪𝘦𝘴 𝘧𝘰𝘳 𝘢 𝘱𝘰𝘳𝘵𝘧𝘰𝘭𝘪𝘰 𝘰𝘧 1000 𝘊𝘳+ 𝘱𝘳𝘰𝘱𝘦𝘳𝘵𝘪𝘦𝘴 𝘣𝘺 𝘭𝘪𝘢𝘪𝘴𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘸𝘪𝘵𝘩 𝘪𝘯𝘵𝘦𝘳𝘯𝘢𝘭 & 𝘦𝘹𝘵𝘦𝘳𝘯𝘢𝘭 𝘴𝘵𝘢𝘬𝘦𝘩𝘰𝘭𝘥𝘦𝘳𝘴• Spearheaded Project branding and Innovation in Communication & Creative strategy, by working with Creative Agencies• Handled performance marketing (paid & organic), Campaign Analytics(Google&FB), & Social media presence• Conceptualized the design and implementation of M3M Connect, a Channel partner digital engagement App• Optimized Media Mix by increasing focus on digital marketing leading to savings in media spending by 10%• Achieved TOM awareness of 50%+ through innovation in OOH & Print, and research led remedial measures• Reduced CPL by 12% through Improved targeting using google analytics, eliminating low ROI channels,& SEO strategies• Improved lead conversion by 8% by Integrating Chatbots into landing pages to reduce latency in response time
experience.description_html:
𝘓𝘦𝘥 360-𝘥𝘦𝘨𝘳𝘦𝘦 𝘮𝘢𝘳𝘬𝘦𝘵𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘢𝘤𝘵𝘪𝘷𝘪𝘵𝘪𝘦𝘴 𝘧𝘰𝘳 𝘢 𝘱𝘰𝘳𝘵𝘧𝘰𝘭𝘪𝘰 𝘰𝘧 1000 𝘊𝘳+ 𝘱𝘳𝘰𝘱𝘦𝘳𝘵𝘪𝘦𝘴 𝘣𝘺 𝘭𝘪𝘢𝘪𝘴𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘸𝘪𝘵𝘩 𝘪𝘯𝘵𝘦𝘳𝘯𝘢𝘭 & 𝘦𝘹𝘵𝘦𝘳𝘯𝘢𝘭 𝘴𝘵𝘢𝘬𝘦𝘩𝘰𝘭𝘥𝘦𝘳𝘴

• Spearheaded Project branding and Innovation in Communication & Creative strategy, by working with Creative Agencies
• Handled performance marketing (paid & organic), Campaign Analytics(Google&FB), & Social media presence
• Conceptualized the design and implementation of M3M Connect, a Channel partner digital engagement App
• Optimized Media Mix by increasing focus on digital marketing leading to savings in media spending by 10%
• Achieved TOM awareness of 50%+ through innovation in OOH & Print, and research led remedial measures
• Reduced CPL by 12% through Improved targeting using google analytics, eliminating low ROI channels,& SEO strategies
• Improved lead conversion by 8% by Integrating Chatbots into landing pages to reduce latency in response time

projects.title: A Study on Supply Chain Management In Construction Industry
projects.description: My project team studied the feasibility of applying supply chain management principles to a Prefabricated construction project. We concentrated on the demand management and inventory management aspects of the project. We applied techniques like value chain mapping and inventory management model (Economic batch Quality ) to effectively reduce wastage and improve productivity at the contraction site.

Clubs: ▪️ Ex-member of the Association of Computing Machinery and IEEE student chapter, PES University. ▪️ Held a core team position at Codechef, PES University.

recommendations: Prasanna babu Sivakumar “I had the pleasure of mentoring and guiding Prisha during her internship at Fidelity Investments, where she consistently impressed me with her dedication and skills. Prisha demonstrated exceptional backend skills and the ability to collaborate effectively to solve problems quickly. She played a crucial role in our project, contributing to UX, API development, loading data into DynamoDB, and being a key contributor during UAT testing, which significantly helped the team meet deadlines. Two instances where Prisha stood out include the initial local workspace setup, where the team faced issues. Prisha proactively reached out to her friends and seniors to resolve and complete the setup within two days, a task that typically takes a week. During UAT testing, she actively tested the new UX workflows, identified defects, and fixed the issues she found. Beyond her technical skills, Prisha is a team player with a positive attitude and excellent communication skills. I wholeheartedly recommend Prisha for any position she pursues. Her talent and dedication will undoubtedly make her an asset to any team”

Her passion for our mission was evident in every task she undertook. I am confident that she will excel in any endeavor she chooses and strongly recommend her for future opportunities.”

recommendations: Rajan Singh “Vijay is very focused , intelligent and under pressure performer.We were the part of same Misys team.His technical skills and out of box thinking have astonished me multiple times.He is always ready for challenges and a excellent team player.I remember one instance in which Vijay took the lead of understanding the complex requirements and materializing those in reality helping other team members.He is a very quick learner whether it's technology,process or any new methods.His knowledge in Java and C++ has been pretty advanced.The product we work together has huge use cases and requires good financial and business knowledge , but i have seen him navigating through product smoothly and fearlessly even senior people could not do it.i think that Vijay will be a great asset in any one team and i will be more than happy to work with him in future.”

Richard Moon “Excellent software engineer. Dedicated, technically talented, with good communication skills. When one of our largest, most complex customers requested on-site technical assistance in preparation for go-live, we flew Vjay over to the United States from India. The trip was an unqualified success. The customer was very satisfied and we were able to enhance the product based on recommendations that Vjay brought back.”
